first_quest.en_description: Go talk to the random monk.
first_quest.fr_description: Va parler au moine derrière le temple.

find_sentences_in_chaiyaphum.en_description: Talk to everybody in Chaiyaphum and collect their sentences.
find_sentences_in_chaiyaphum.fr_description: Parle à tous les habitants de Chaiyaphum et collecte leurs phrases.
find_sentences_in_chaiyaphum.en_end_description: Go back to Illo in Chaiyaphum's temple.
find_sentences_in_chaiyaphum.fr_end_description: Retourne voir Illo au temple de Chaiyaphum.
en_finish_dialog: Congratulations, [Name], you've found all the sentences!
fr_finish_dialog: Félicitations, [Name], t'as trouvé toutes les phrases.

implant_source_behind_the_temple.en_description: Go behind the temple, produce the word อะไร, and implant it into the source that is used for training shamans.

implant_word_cut.en_description: We get the Spell for cut: ตัด. We have to implant it into a source. When we have done so, the quest is complete. Until we do so, we can get the Spell again and again at the shaman.
